DamageResistances: Bludgeoning, Slashing and Piercing from non-magical weapons

Traits.Name: Evasive Maneuvers
Traits.Content: The Hippantrope has advantage on Dexterity saving throws made to avoid area effects, such as a dragon's breath or an evoker's spell.

Traits.Name: Haunting Presence
Traits.Content: Creatures that start their turn within 30 feet of the Hippantrope have disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws until they move out of that range.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Hippantrope makes three attacks: one with its Haunting Kick and two with its Disturbing Bite. Alternatively, it can use its Terrifying Whinny twice.

Actions.Name: Haunting Kick
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Actions.Name: Disturbing Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. The target must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Terrifying Whinny
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 150 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (3d6) thunder damage. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be deafened until the end of its next turn.
